I think I've got just the ticket for you! If you're looking for a thrilling ride with international espionage, I'd recommend "Taken" (2008). Liam Neeson stars as a former CIA operative who will stop at nothing to rescue his daughter from human traffickers - it's an adrenaline-fueled ride that'll keep you on the edge of your seat!

If you'd prefer something more light-hearted and fun, "Cars 2" (2011) might be the way to go. Who wouldn't want to join Lightning McQueen and Mater as they take their racing skills to the world stage? It's a fun adventure that's perfect for all ages!

I think you might really enjoy "Total Recall"! It's a classic sci-fi action film with Arnold Schwarzenegger as a factory worker who discovers his memories are false and he's actually a spy. The plot is full of twists and turns, and it has a great balance of humor and action.

If you're looking for something more recent and still in the spy genre, "Quantum of Solace" is another great option. It's the second installment in the Daniel Craig-era James Bond series, and it features plenty of high-stakes action and intrigue.
